resources.string: Discover Your Favourite Music!
Tap here to access our Music library across Language/ Category of your choice.
Got It!
What\'s That Song!
Listening to a song but can’t identify the name? Tap this icon n you’ll know!
App Settings
Tap to access your Profile info,\n Playlists, Downloads, Favorites and more.

Login/ Register to –
- Save your favorite songs to
Play without Internet.
- Add/ Edit Playlists
- View all Download
- Points & Badges earned
- Lots more to do...
Enjoy uninterrupted ad-free music and video, unlimited\nsongs to save for playback without internet, and more.
Tap to Sort your Offline songs\nand related Settings
Swipe to Remove Songs from cache
Drag/Tap to close the player
Clear Queue
Shuffle/Repeat\n has moved here
Rearrange Songs listing.\nTap & Hold. Darg to move.
Swipe to Remove Songs from Queue
Customize your Music Screen!
Tap to filter content and customize your music home screen.
Download this Song!
Tap to Download this song and play without Internet. Save on data cost.
Own this MP3 forever!
Tap on 3-dot menu to GET & OWN this MP3 forever.
